text: Leif Georg Folke "Totte" Bengtsson (born 24 April 1944) is a Swedish former ice hockey center and Olympian. Bengtsson played with Team Sweden at the 1968 Winter Olympics held in Grenoble, France.https://www.hockey- reference.com/olympics/athletes/arne-carlsson-2 He previously played for Leksands IF and Djurgårdens IF Hockey in the Swedish Elite League.Society for International Hockey Research Database, retrieved June 29, 2015 ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Djurgårdens IF Hockey players Category:Ice hockey players at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Living people Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Sweden Category:Swedish ice hockey centres
title: Folke Bengtsson
